mapper.select: select user_id, nick_name, avatar, impression, info from user where nick_name like concat(concat('%',#{nickName}),'%')
select user_id, nick_name from user where login_name = #{loginName} limit 1
select user_id, nick_name from user where nick_name = #{nickName} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert ignore into user (login_name, password, nick_name) values (#{loginName}, #{password}, #{nickName})
